casebody.data:
Danny A. HOGAN, Appellant,
v.
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, as trustee, in trust FOR The REGISTERED HOLDERS OF MORGAN STANLEY ABS CAPITAL I TRUST 2004-NC2, Mortgage Pass-through Certificates, Series 2004-NC2; The Little Mermaid Condominium Association Inc.; and Unknown Spouse of Danny A. Hogan, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-1743 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed August 24, 2018.

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
